name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. James HALL, Appellant

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. James HALL, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
ZAPPALA, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: John W. Paekel, L. Roy Zipris, Ellen T. Greenlee, Philadelphia, for James Hall.
Catherine Marshall, Lawrence J. Goode, Philadelhia, for Com.
casebody.head_matter:
719 A.2d 742
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. James HALL, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 22, 1998.
Decided Nov. 9, 1998.
John W. Paekel, L. Roy Zipris, Ellen T. Greenlee, Philadelphia, for James Hall.
Catherine Marshall, Lawrence J. Goode, Philadelhia, for Com.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
